name: Operation Merkur
overview: Operation Merkur or Operation Mercury is a strategy game about the Battle of Crete a major Axis airborne and amphibious operation during World War II. It can be played trying for either Allied or German supremacy. Thanks to detailed maps, informative menus and extensive instructions, the overview of what is happening is maintained at all times. Many adjustable and special options and various re-loadable ones. Scenarios allow the degree of difficulty to vary. It was published in Golden Disk 64 1991/08.
